text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Now then, all that's left is, 
this extra large… green one.

A mysterious light revolves around her body. 
Stay Gold is now trying to return the final one 
to its owner.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Well… I have an idea, although…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I don't know if I should return it. 
This light… I got a bad feeling about it.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
The light is dark and the way it moves 
is shaky. It's a polar opposite to Spe's 
extra large light.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Maybe… it'd be better 
if I held onto it…
Um… Stego.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Suzuka? Why are you here?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I don't know myself, although… 
I just felt like something called me here.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I see. Coming here without searching 
for anything… The owner is attracted 
to it, it seems.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Well if that's the case, there's no point 
in hiding it. But, if I return this light…

It's just as she said, this light might 
not be a good thing. However…
choice_data_list: I think… it's better to return it.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
…You're right. This is an inevitable test 
in this journey. I can't gain anything if I 
can't overcome this.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Alright… here I go, Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah, alright…

For one moment… I felt like I could see 
the light that, up until now, I couldn't see.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Wha-!?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Are you okay, Suzuka!? 
What the hell is this light…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… This… is…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah… it's the wind from "that day"…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
The wind of hope… the wind pushing 
me forward… And…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The headwind that swept everything away…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And yet, I… I'm loved… remembered…

The usually quiet Silence Suzuka was 
crying waterfalls. All without a sound 
leaving her body.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: …Are you okay, Suzuka?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Although…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
This feeling… I feel like I shouldn't forget it. 
That's why…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I was… able to feel it…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I can't control this sadness… 
And yet… I have no regrets.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I see… if that's the case, everything should 
be fine. After all ——

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
"Render unto Caesar the things that 
are Caesar's". At the end of the day, 
this light belonged to Silence Suzuka.

Silence Suzuka was able to bear the weight 
of the light. And now ——

At long last, all the lights revolving 
around Stay Gold… have vanished.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Phew, man… 
That's a weight off my shoulders.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I've finished returning everything. 
I'm now… free.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I can finally begin a new journey. 
A journey for gold.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
You may or may not be my companion 
on that trip, but —— What type of trip 
would you go on?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
A completely new journey, huh… 
Indeed, that's a good journey.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Finally being able to go on a new journey. 
It seems fun to venture somewhere you've 
never walked before.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Oh I'm getting excited now! I can feel 
the energy flowing to the tip of my tail!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
No matter what happens, never give up. 
Keep pushing forward. Even if it's till 
the ends of this Earth.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
A completely new journey, huh… 
Indeed, that's a good journey.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Finally being able to go on a new journey. 
It seems fun to venture somewhere you've 
never walked before.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
My heart's thumping like crazy! I'm getting 
a little passionate, all the way to my tail.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
No matter what happens, never give up. 
Keep pushing forward. No matter where 
you go.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Revisiting an old journey… 
I see, retaking a path once taken before.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
That's a good journey. What type of journey 
you're going on isn't dependent on the 
destination, but rather what you feel.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
And since I am who I am now, there are 
definitely things I would notice this time.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
This time I'm gonna learn something new! 
Yup, after all I— don't know when to quit. 
Not at all.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Revisiting an old journey… 
I see, retaking a path once taken before.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
That's a good journey. What type of journey 
you're going on isn't dependent on the 
destination, but rather what you feel.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
And since I am who I am now, there should 
be things I'd notice now. Yeah, at least a few 
of them.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
A second go around wouldn't be bad, 
a chance to glean something new. 
So shall we embark upon a wistful 
and nostalgic journey?
